title: Something's very wrong with Elementalist Lux

replies.body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/keybind-wars-which-key-best-flash

Numerical proof that flash on D is correct.
#DO NOT QUESTION MY GENIUS!

You do realise it says "73% of Korean players have flash on F" ?

But then, what do I know, maybe the gap is closing recently.

But the winrate #'s, particularly in Master+ tier, favor flash on D

:D

Simply explained:

D is closer to Q-W-E keys so you have a smaller delay between thinking "mus flash" and executing it compared to flash on F.
Also easier to DFlash - Ult since it doesn't use the same fingers :D

> [{quoted}](name=Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ax05Qjnk,comment-id=00090003000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-07T23:15:45.586+0000)
>
> Also easier to DFlash - Ult since it doesn't use the same fingers :D

Shit, this is a good point. After 3k+ games of flash on F, I might have to switch.

God, I hate logic.
Or you can do what my buddy MeyeA does and bind flash to spacebar :D

> [{quoted}](name=Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ax05Qjnk,comment-id=0009000300000000000000030000,timestamp=2016-11-08T18:51:43.201+0000)
>
> Or you can do what my buddy MeyeA does and bind flash to spacebar :D

But then how does MeyeA center his/her camera?
I.... don't know... It couldn't be with Y, because that's obviously the keybind for mastery emote (T is for Taunt)

except my e d r and f keys are all controlled by the same finger.
i use my pinkie for pressing tab and control and shift and stuff. so my pointer gets 4 keys on the other side.
Are you a closet Annie main?
It's simple. F is for flash, and D is for Dignite, Dexhaust, Dteleport, Dsmite, Dheal, Dcleanse, Dbarrier, and Dghost

> Dignite

Did Diglett get a new evolution lol

Alolan Diglett, the Ground/Fire type lmao

(I haven't researched Idunno if there's even an Alolan diglett)
Its Ground Steel but it lost arena trap but got a an attack buff so now its base 100 from 80 so it can still acta as  revenge killer, just not a trapper
All it means is that Master tier players are good enough to compensate for the "flash on D" handicap. :p

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GXzqTZ-bUAs&t=17

No statistics can beat this argument.
If most Korean's are using Flash on the F key then I will copy them. I mean, they must be doing something right.

When in doubt, follow the Koreans. We poor folks in NA merely play league, they were born for it. They *live* league.

https://i.makeagif.com/media/10-31-2015/96toD_.gif

They even worship league characters.......
http://img.cinemablend.com/cb/6/f/7/9/3/0/6f7930933e54dd2a39fae54f14346673aa36ba78c228cebcbef9a04cb37d78a8.jpg

Well techincally that was in China, but close enough.
https://funnypictures2.fjcdn.com/reaction_gifs/Close+enough+_156c262008133a0.gif

That is not numerical proof. It is a 0.1% difference, that is what is know as statistically insignificant. It is noise. There is no real difference in winrate between flash on D/F.

Rito plz
https://media.giphy.com/media/IagvD28f6mcoM/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ax05Qjnk,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-11-07T21:15:59.341+0000)
>
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/keybind-wars-which-key-best-flash
> 
> Numerical proof that flash on D is correct.

I have flash on D.

D for destined to be challenged.

D to Dance/Dash {{summoner:4}} 

F for Fire! {{summoner:14}}
Uh, you math'd wrong. F is for Flash. As proven by that link.

D for Dlash, F for Famage.

...Wait
D is for Defense {{summoner:4}}, F is for FIRE {{summoner:14}}
I never knew Riot was inferior in all ways. [Not surprised though.](http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/928/950/2db.jpg)
Press D to Dash
But flash isn't a dash. It's actually very important that it's a different thing. F for Flash.

>
> But flash isn't a dash. It's actually very important that it's a different thing. F for Flash.

F for fire.

That burns down the whole town.
U for uranium, bombs.
N is for no survivors, when you-
PLANKTON!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=SwimyFish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ax05Qjnk,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-07T21:40:35.865+0000)

Have my upboat *friend*

Doesn't everyone has Flash on D? 

D for Dash, F for Fire in the hole {{summoner:14}}

Flash on D?

I put it on P, for Panic.

Lux is a D flasher confirmed 

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/929/429/8e1.gif

we are many

{{summoner:4}}  on D master race here, checking in. 

Sometimes you need to slip that D real quick for the dank jukes, rather than reach far over there for that tasty dodge. I MEAN REALLY GUYS, it makes more sense that teleport and other things be farther than the most important spell in game.
I've always had Flash on D since I started playing 3 years ago. It's where mine defaulted and I left it there. Can't get used to it anywhere else so it stays. It's gotten me to plat so far haha

i hate having flash on F my resting finger is always on my ult so i can use {{summoner:14}} or {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:7}} faster.there are just too many situations where i need faster access to other summoner spells over {{summoner:4}} thus i cant afford to have flash there
if you don't have flash on d you're fucking bad my dude
But you're more attuned to using your index finger instead of your middle finger (unless you _really_ like flipping people off) so it's easier to tap F in a tight situation than D.
Am I the only person who presses both d and f with my index finger?
I prefer to flash my d
D is for dash.
TFW your F is most people's Q and your D is one of your items.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I use a different keyboard layout, I have Flash on E and the other one on I. Also, my abilities are on BÉPO.
what alien kind key board do you have? :o
